about_the_game:
This is now a "soundtrack" for all the "music" I make for my games. THIS IS THE SAME SOUNDTRACK AS THE SUPPORT THE DEVS DLC and the STALKS STALKS STALKS DLC

FREE ON BANDCAMP:


This DLC is meant to financially support the devs. Nothing is added to the game. The only thing you gain is the satisfaction of financially supporting the game devs of Goblin Rules Football. Oh, also, in multiplayer lobbies a little icon should appear next to your name to let the other players know that I think you're a king/queen/cool person.
